Series.Overview: Alpha House follows four senators who live together in a rented house in Washington DC. Re-election battles, looming indictments, parties, their Party... these senators need a drink. And a new housemate.

Episode.Overview: Get a taste of Alpha House, the new Amazon Originals comedy series featuring John Goodman and created by Garry Trudeau. New episodes available exclusively for Amazon Prime members.

From the set of the second season of Alpha House, the cast and crew talk about the controversies, mayhem and silliness the four senators stir up as they brace for the elections - and a few nights on the couch.

Episode.Overview: As the re-election battles heat up the four senators travel to Afghanistan as part of a Congressional Delegation.

Episode.Overview: After a surprise explosion in Afghanistan leaves Louis recovering from an injury, Adriana makes controversial private arrangements for the group to return home.

Episode.Overview: Louis continues to gain constituent support as Shelby chronicles his recovery. Gil John faces Digger Mancusi in a town hall where he struggles to keep up with his polished and well-liked opponent, despite much help and coaching from Robert and Andy.

Episode.Overview: Rosalyn organizes a prayer brunch to celebrate Louis' homecoming from the hospital, but the Senators and their fellow Democrats find it difficult to set aside their differences. Aaron and Tammy's relationship continues to grow and Lola has a surprise in store for James.

Episode.Overview: While on the campaign trail through North Carolina, Gil John blows off a meeting with the governor to visit Ruby Shoals where he becomes re-inspired about his campaign. Robert's pro-fracking visit to a constituent's home in Pennsylvania does not go as planned.

Episode.Overview: Robert proves to the ethics committee that he would never take a mohair suit while Andy prepares to deliver a rebuttal after the State of the Union. Louis is put in the spotlight on his first day back when James mistakenly tweets a photo intended for Lola from the wrong account.

Episode.Overview: Louis decides to help showgirls organize, but the Watt brothers stand in his way. A video of Gil John hitting a soldier with a chair in Afghanistan goes viral so Maddie looks for a way to humanize him and Andy's Vanity Fair cover shoot takes an unexpected direction.

Episode.Overview: When another senator dies unexpectedly, Gil John is asked to organize the funeral arrangements. Louis wins the Nevada primary but Robert has to face off in a Pennsylvania debate to cool the competition.

Episode.Overview: Gil John pays a visit to the Watt brothers, Louis worries when an old college friend threatens to share stories, and Andy tries to talk his way out of "Gaffergate," only to learn he's got bigger image problems.

Episode.Overview: Andy and Adriana start planning for a future worthy of a first family. Louis preps for the "Funniest Celebrity in Washington" contest, while his opponent, Penn Jillette, preps for their senate race. Back at the house, the Watt brothers find a new way to taunt Gil John.

Episode.GuestStars: |Alicia Sable|Brooke Bloom|Kobi Libii|Wanda Sykes|Julie White|Haley Joel Osment|Natalie Gold|Willa Fitzgerald|Sofiya Akilova|Marylouise Burke|Lila Newman|Lucy DeVito|Lee Tergesen|Janel Moloney|Amy Hohn|Abigail Marlowe|
Episode.Overview: Cee Biggs brings her reality show cameras to her father's office just in time for gunshots that trigger a lockdown on Capitol Hill. Rosalyn forces Robert to face the truth about his marriage, and Louis is forced to let go of a fantasy.

Episode.GuestStars: |Yara Martinez|Alicia Sable|Brooke Bloom|Kobi Libii|Ben Rameaka|Penn Jillette|Amy Sedaris|Julie White|Haley Joel Osment|Matthew Humphreys|Natalie Gold|Sofiya Akilova|Abigail Marlowe|Lila Newman|Kate Jennings Grant|Tony Plana|Wendy Makkena|Kenneth Tigar|Br
Episode.Overview: Gil John tries to right things after the Watts brothers "Swift Boat" his former player. Julie shocks Louis and Louise by announcing she's pregnant from an anonymous donor, while Adriana confronts Marta the housekeeper about Andy. Louis tries to debate Penn Jillette, but he's no match for what the magician has up his sleeves.

Episode.GuestStars: |Yara Martinez|Amy Sedaris|Julie White|Bradley Whitford|Natalie Gold|Willa Fitzgerald|Wendy Makkena|Janel Moloney|William Thomas Evans|Amy Rutberg|Jim Morris|Jack Halpin|Gary Leimkuhler|
Episode.Overview: The senators head to a Republican retreat at a Virginia plantation, where they're haunted by the ghosts of slavery, Ronald Reagan and their exes. After a soul-cleansing bonfire with the housemates, Gil John awakes with a new fire in his belly.

Episode.GuestStars: |Yara Martinez|Brooke Bloom|Ben Rameaka|Bob Balaban|Penn Jillette|Amy Sedaris|Wanda Sykes|Julie White|Todd Susman|Lee Wilkof|Natalie Gold|Lucy DeVito|Lila Newman|Tony Plana|Abigail Marlowe|Christine Renee Miller|Tamara Torres|Lucy Owen|
Episode.Overview: Gil John finally breaks through to daughter Cee, then gets a lesson in civility from the women's caucus. Andy heads to Miami to try and win back Adriana, and gets some insights into his "condition" from a therapist. Meanwhile, Robert ignores his advisors and helps register black voters.

Episode.GuestStars: |Yara Martinez|Alicia Sable|Brooke Bloom|Ben Rameaka|Penn Jillette|Wanda Sykes|Richard Cox|Natalie Gold|William Thomas Evans|Janel Moloney|Tony Plana|Marylouise Burke|Christopher McLinden|Bianca Amato|Amelia Campbell|Andy Schneeflock|Ptolemy Slocum|
Episode.Overview: After a break-in at the Alpha House, the NSA does a sweep, and gets suspicious -- which lands Robert a new covert mission. Meanwhile, Gil John goes to bat for the women's caucus bill, earning him a whole new following. And Louis's aides inspire him to publicly "evolve" on gay marriage, much to their chagrin.

Episode.Overview: Gil John gets attacked by Sarah Palin and embraced by the media. Pressured by the party chair, Louis nudges Julie to consider a big wedding. Robert is forced to kiss up to his ex-wife's new beau, but gets some help from Rosalyn (Wanda Sykes).

Episode.GuestStars: |Yara Martinez|Alicia Sable|Kobi Libii|Brooke Bloom|Ben Rameaka|Penn Jillette|Amy Sedaris|Wanda Sykes|Julie White|Bruce Altman|Josh Pais|Richard Cox|Natalie Gold|Willa Fitzgerald|Lee Tergesen|William Thomas Evans|Kate Jennings Grant|Molly Kate Bernard|Jak
Episode.Overview: As the election returns come in, Gil John meets with a presidential campaign advisor, while Robert wonders if he still has a job. Katherine and Julie discover their wedding has been turned into a major political event -- after they arrive.
